WTRAOtext: Delivery by courier in the city to the door: Delivery intervals: from 11:00 to 15:00, from 15:00 to 19:00. The cost of delivery is 150 UAH within our zone on the map. The cost outside the zone is calculated by the manager. When ordering from 1800 UAH, delivery by our courier in Kyiv is free.
TOEOFtext:
Eclairs / marshmallows: the next day when ordered before 18:00. Cakes / tarts: the next day when ordered before 18:00. Day by day: check the availability of ready-made desserts by phone! Every day we prepare a stock of desserts for urgent of orders :)
The order is considered accepted after confirmation by the manager.
We accept orders every day from 9 a.m. to 7 p.m.
If you don't want to wait, visit our pastry shop and buy the desserts that are available in the window.
PFOtext:
Pick-up with 100% prepayment. Delivery - 100% prepayment.
Payment options after confirming the order:
Online payment on the website (Liqpay)
FAQ: All the information you need on creating a purchase and delivery is here
Delivery by taxi: Delivery by taxi (at the carrier's rates)
Payment: By clicking the "Order" button, you will be redirected to the liqpay payment page
ThankPurchase: Thank you for your purchase. Your order is being processed.
Delivery is carried: Delivery is carried out at taxi rates, at a precisely defined time
Geo-zone: Geo-zone of delivery in the city
Delivery date must be in the future: Delivery date must be in the future
